categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Amanda Lawrence is an actress who played Commander Larma D'Acy in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker.
In 2012, she appeared in an episode of Midsomer Murders ("A Rare Bird") with Genevieve O'Reilly and Nicholas Boulton.
